name: WashingtonDCMetroBusPredictions
0:
”Alexa, open metro bus”
”Alexa, ask metro bus for arrival times”
”when is the next bus coming?”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: metro bus
des:
Get arrival times for the five closest buses to your favorite stop in Washington, D.C.

This app is not affiliated with or maintained by the Washington Metropolitan Area Transit Authority.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
